title: The_Boy_In_The_Plastic_Bubble_1976_XviD_BertieNet.avi
description:
Title:     The boy in the plastic bubble
Format:    AVI XviD
Region:    ALL
Year:      1976
imdb link: http://imdb.com/title/tt0074236/

Main cast:
  John Travolta
  Glynnis O&#039;Conner
  Robert Reed

John Travolta stars as The Boy In The Plastic Bubble. This film is based on multiple case histories of people born without an immune system, Travolta gives a touching performance as a young man separated by family and friends in a quarantined, germ-free isolation environment.

Robert Reed of Brady Bunch TV fame and Diana Hyland play Travolta&#039;s overprotective parents. Glynnis O&#039;Conner stars as the love interest that forces Travolta to question his life. What is more important, the quality or the quantity of his life? Is he just a prisoner separated from the world?

A 1970&#039;s American film that was very popular and capitalized on the success of TV stars Travolta (Welcome Back Kotter) and Reed. A heartwarming melodrama of hope and tragedy.
